personal.name: Doan Duy Phuong
personal.title: Senior iOS Engineer
personal.tagline: Building innovative mobile experiences with passion and precision

summary.headline: Senior iOS Engineer passionate about creating innovative mobile experiences
summary.description: With over 5+ years of experience in iOS development, including leadership roles at prominent tech companies, I bring a wealth of expertise in creating innovative, high-quality mobile applications.

paragraphs: My journey into iOS development began with a passion for mobile technology and user experience. What started as curiosity about how apps work quickly evolved into a deep expertise in iOS development using Swift and Objective-C.

Over the past 5+ years, I've had the privilege of working with dynamic teams across different countries - from Singapore's SP Group to Canadian tech companies like Windscribe. I specialize in MVVM architecture, Core frameworks, and modern iOS development practices.
When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new iOS technologies, contributing to development communities, or mentoring fellow developers in mobile app development best practices.

timeline.title: Senior iOS Engineer
timeline.description: Collaborated with dynamic design team to create UI Design System library for iOS App. Migration existing features and refactoring UI code. Applied AI for support coding and research.

timeline.title: Senior iOS Developer
timeline.description: Developed app user experience adhering to Apple's interface guidelines. Utilized Swift and Xcode following MVVM architecture and SOLID principles with 100% test coverage.

timeline.title: iOS Developer
timeline.description: Led team development and conducted code reviews. Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated deployment and contributed to strategic discussions with CEO and CTO.

timeline.title: iOS Developer
timeline.description: Maintained and implemented improvements for existing features. Developed CI/CD pipelines and led architecture refactoring efforts using Apple Framework AVFoundation.

education.description: Specialized in software engineering with focus on mobile application development and computer science fundamentals.

interests.name: iOS Development
interests.description: Staying updated with latest iOS technologies and frameworks

interests.name: Tech Leadership
interests.description: Mentoring developers and leading technical discussions

cta.headline: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
cta.description: I'm always excited to work on innovative iOS projects and collaborate with talented teams to create exceptional mobile experiences.
